AdebayorZakariAdje (amụrụ na 12 Nọvemba 1996) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba maka klọb Niger Premier League USGN, na mgbazinye site na klọb Danish 1st Division HB Køge
N'afọ 2016, Adebayor nwere nnwale na Ligue 1 FC Lorient na AS Monaco mana enyeghị ya nkwekọrịta na klọb ọ bụla.

N'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2018, Vejle Boldklub dị na Denmark kwupụtara mbinye aka Adebayor site na Inter Allies na nkwekọrịta mgbazinye ego ruo ụbọchị iri atọ n'ọnwarị n'afọ 2019. Otú ọ dị, otu ọnwa mgbe e mesịrị, klọb ahụ kwupụtara na ha chọrọ ịkwụsị nkwekọrịta mgbazinye ego ahụ n'ihi na Adebayor apụtaghị dị ka ha kwekọrịtara na klọb enweghị ike ịkpọtụrụ onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ.

Otú ọ dị, ọ laghachiri Denmark n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na klọb nke 1st Division nke Danish HB Køge, nke bụ klọb bọọlụ Danish ọkachamara nke dị n'obodo Her останови, na nke abụọ n'obodo Køge, ma na Køge Municipality. Otú ọ dị, na 4 Machị 2021, klọb ahụ kwupụtara, na a gbazinyere Adebayor na Legon Cities, n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ịnọ nso na ezinụlọ ya n'ihi ihe onwe onye. Na 10 Septemba 2021, Adebayor kwetara na ya na ENPPI SC nke Egypt ga-akwụ ụgwọ otu afọ.
Ọ bụ onye kacha gbaa goolu na Niger na goolu iri na asatọ n'egwuregwu iri anọ na atọ.
